name: stilted
text: A comment left by stilted was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by GusPlease, abe, Darthemed)

name: woodenteeth
text: Umm, so, without the punch line the joke wouldn't work. Yes. Right.

name: i_love_kate
text: Achewood has punchlines?

name: woodenteeth
text: If you take off your glasses and squint and maybe give yourself a half-commodore.

name: belgand
text: I don't think you can give yourself a half-commodore. Neither can it be halved nor can you do it to yourself.

name: woodenteeth
text:
It is possible, must I draw you a diagram?

I will not draw you a diagram.

name: dusty
text: I think it may not be that it's physically impossible as much as the "you can't tickle yourself" principal. However with sex this is only half true, according to a recent Scientific American Article, there may be a way to sexually satisfy yourself! Scientists have developed a working theory and expect to publish a novel method by 2013.

name: woodenteeth
text:
Oh fuck!

There will be diagrams. The secret will be out!

name: belgand
text:
The Secret was already published a number of years ago. A multi-volume set it was deposited in our conception of space-time by a multi-dimensional being that is capable of, to our understanding, functional omniscience. It contains every secret that has ever existed that, until the date of publication, was not yet revealed.

Now we all know what you did in middle school and we are very disappointed in you.

name: woodenteeth
text: In order to get off I used to imagine all of your disappointed expressions fixed on me.

name: wino
text: ray has the best one liners i've ever heard.

name: william
text: what is with ray and doing things side-saddle ?

name: rapid_roy
text: yeah, riding side-saddle really ruins his cool

name: lordhumungus
text: It's because he's so frikken hetero, he can do stuff like that.

name: deimosrising
text: The outsourced alt-text is pretty weak. The party is clearly over by this point. Way to go Sean

name: tfaironpirate
text: See, I didn't even make the connection to the story line, so instead I just imagined that "This party is now nine times longer then Woodstock" would be something Ray would say just to express his fondness for imaginary motorcycle rides.

name: jhunt
text: It's always a little disconcerting to me to be reminded of Ray's actual size.

name: belgand
text: That is no longer much of an issue. This was still under the conceit that the animals were getting up to things when the humans weren't around. It's been largely away from that for years now.

name: hateandwar
text: I figured size referred to his dong

name: mr_pete
text: Man this strip is hella old, but it is also okay, because Ray is becoming Ray.

name: abe
text: I want to do this someday.

name: cashprizes
text: ride a motorcycle sidesaddle?

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Ray's riding that hog like a bitchy-bitch bitch man.

name: kelsotimebomb
text: Like a Mr. Lady-Lady.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: "You lookin' damn fine, ladies. Me, not so much. Kinda like Charlie McCarthy on a Shovelhead."

name: a_dude
text: A comment left by a_dude was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by recognizer, especial, Darthemed)

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "Today's alt text by Sean Collins of New York City: 'This party is now nine times longer than Woodstock'"

name: stuart
text: Achewoodstock

name: clockworkorange
text: I would totally go to that.

name: woodenteeth
text:
It's just the tenmen for 10hours.

OK, yeah, I'd go as well.

name: tfaironpirate
text: I would totally pass out at that.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: His intense expression as he calls at the ladies.

name: dasilodavi
text: This cat named Ray has an odd affinity for side-saddle riding.

name: chaobell
text: Why does Ray ride side-saddle? I could understand it if he wasn't neutered, because if the world ran on common sense men would ride side-saddle. Think about it.

name: deusoma
text: But he isn't neutered, that was a different Mr. Smuckles.

name: tekende
text: If the world ran on common sense we wouldn't have motorcycles at all.

name: asobi
text:
Steve McQueen says to take that back.

[IMGS OFF]

name: tekende
text: Is that what he looks like. Huh.

name: belgand
text:
Steve McQueen ran off to join the circus, worked as a towel boy at a brothel, was a pallbearer at Bruce Lee's funeral, and was legally declared incorrigible.

Clearly there is no higher role model.

name: sagoon
text: i like how it shows that, proportionally, he is still cat sized

name: nymphadoria
text: Aah...sidesaddle, the ultimate bitch position

name: coco
text: Oh Ray . . . you are sadly mistaken . . .

name: beansdooma
text: the perspective on the handlebars and his arms is all out of wack. his far arm is grabbing the close bar and vice-versa.

name: wonelove
text: Yeah, his arms are cris-crossed

name: random_shorts
text:
only in two of the three frames.

That makes it 33% accurate.

name: smallberries
text: Is this *really* the same Escalade-driving mackdaddy Ray of ... the future?
